data.prayer: Lord, please give the 5,254 believers in the state of Zachodniopomorskie the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zachodniopomorskie, Poland
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 5,254 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Zachodniopomorskie.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Zachodniopomorskie do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Zachodniopomorskie access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Polish-speaking people.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Zachodniopomorskie to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Zachodniopomorskie, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zachodniopomorskie, Poland has a population of 1,693,200.

We estimate Zachodniopomorskie has 5,254 people who might know Jesus, 1,510,045 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 177,901 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 322 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Zachodniopomorskie to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
